summary: This document is an email exchange between two FBI employees regarding potential assistance with the Epstein case. The New York Field Office seeks help with discovery preparation and case organization, while the other employee offers flexible support.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: Works at the FBI New York Field Office in Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking, seeking assistance with discovery preparation and organizing for the Epstein case.

connections.description: Colleagues within the FBI, with Mandy reaching out to M to discuss potential assistance on the Epstein case.

events.title: Request for assistance on Epstein case
events.description: Mandy from the FBI New York Field Office emails M to discuss potential help with discovery preparation and organizing for the Epstein case.

events.title: Response offering flexible support
events.description: An FBI employee responds to Mandy's request, noting scheduling difficulties due to their work in SO (likely Special Operations or similar) but offering flexible assistance.

keyFacts: The FBI New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit was actively working on the Epstein case as of July 2020.
Assistance was being sought for discovery preparation and case organization, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
An FBI employee from a different unit (SO) offered flexible support despite potential scheduling conflicts.
The correspondence shows internal FBI coordination on the Epstein investigation post-Epstein's death.
